books.author: by David McCullough
books.description: The story of the bicycle mechanics from Ohio who ushered in the age of flight; by the author of “1776” and “The Greater Journey.”
books.name: THE WRIGHT BROTHERS

books.author: by Aziz Ansari with Eric Klinenberg
books.description: The comedian enlists a sociologist to help him understand today’s dating scene.
books.name: MODERN ROMANCE

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: The last voyage of the Lusitania, the passenger liner sunk by a German torpedo in 1915; by the author of “The Devil in the White City.”
books.name: DEAD WAKE

books.author: by David Fisher
books.description: Stories of the American West; a companion volume to the Fox News series.
books.name: BILL O'REILLY'S LEGENDS AND LIES

books.author: by Judd Apatow
books.description: Thirty years’ worth of the filmmaker’s interviews with comedians.
books.name: SICK IN THE HEAD

books.author: by Bill Bryson
books.description: A celebration of the resilience of the English language; first published in 1990 and just reissued.
books.name: THE MOTHER TONGUE

books.author: by Willie Nelson with David Ritz
books.description: The country music star discusses his life’s journey, from selling encyclopedias to professional fame.
books.name: IT'S A LONG STORY

books.author: by David Brooks
books.description: The Times columnist extols personal virtues like kindness and honesty in a materialistic age.
books.name: THE ROAD TO CHARACTER

books.author: by Malala Yousafzai with Christina Lamb
books.description: The experience of the Pakistani girl who advocated for women’s education and was shot by the Taliban.
books.name: I AM MALALA

books.author: by Atul Gawande
books.description: The surgeon and New Yorker writer considers how doctors fail patients at the end of life, and how they can do better.
books.name: BEING MORTAL

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II; a 2014 movie.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Wednesday Martin
books.description: A memoir of life among the wealthy women of the Upper East Side, in the satirical guise of an anthropological study.
books.name: PRIMATES OF PARK AVENUE

books.author: by Piper Kerman
books.description: A Brooklyn woman’s prison memoir. The basis for the Netflix series, originally published in 2010.
books.name: ORANGE IS THE NEW BLACK

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A former member of the Navy SEALs discusses his battlefield experiences during the Iraq war; a 2014 movie.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER
